description: Simple Reporting for dnsmasq log entries in rsyslog postgres DB

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  devicereportedtime AS "time",
  lower(split_part(message,' ', 2)) as dnsmasq_type,
  count(1) 
FROM systemevents
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(devicereportedtime)
and syslogtag like 'dnsmasq%' 
and message like ' query%'
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) not like '$cDNSexclude'
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) in ($DNS)
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) not in (
    SELECT distinct
      lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) as dns_query
    FROM systemevents
    WHERE
      $__timeFilter(devicereportedtime)
    and syslogtag like 'dnsmasq%' 
    and message like ' config%'
    and lower(split_part(message,' ', 5)) = '0.0.0.0'
)
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 5)) in ($Client)
group by devicereportedtime, lower(split_part(message,' ', 2))
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  lower(split_part(message,' ', 5)) as client,
  count(1) as counter
FROM systemevents
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(devicereportedtime)
and syslogtag like 'dnsmasq%' 
and message like ' query%'
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) not like '$cDNSexclude'
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) in ($DNS)
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) not in (
    SELECT distinct
      lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) as dns_query
    FROM systemevents
    WHERE
      $__timeFilter(devicereportedtime)
    and syslogtag like 'dnsmasq%' 
    and message like ' config%'
    and lower(split_part(message,' ', 5)) = '0.0.0.0'
)
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 5)) in ($Client)
group by lower(split_part(message,' ', 5))
ORDER BY 2 desc

SELECT
  lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) as dns_query,
  count(1) as counter
FROM systemevents
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(devicereportedtime)
and syslogtag like 'dnsmasq%' 
and message like ' query%'
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) not like '$cDNSexclude'
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) in ($DNS)
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) not in (
    SELECT distinct
      lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) as dns_query
    FROM systemevents
    WHERE
      $__timeFilter(devicereportedtime)
    and syslogtag like 'dnsmasq%' 
    and message like ' config%'
    and lower(split_part(message,' ', 5)) = '0.0.0.0'
)
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 5)) in ($Client)
group by lower(split_part(message,' ', 3))
ORDER BY 2 desc

list.description: Fill if you want to filter your local LAN request : %mylanname%
list.label: DNS exclude pattern
list.name: cDNSexclude

list.definition:
SELECT
 lower(split_part(message,' ', 5))
FROM systemevents
WHERE   $__timeFilter(devicereportedtime) 
and  syslogtag like 'dnsmasq%' 
and message like ' query%'
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) not like '($cDNSexclude)'
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) not in (
    SELECT distinct
      lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) as dns_query
    FROM systemevents
    WHERE
      $__timeFilter(devicereportedtime)
    and syslogtag like 'dnsmasq%' 
    and message like ' config%'
    and lower(split_part(message,' ', 5)) = '0.0.0.0'
)
ORDER BY 1

list.definition:
SELECT
  distinct lower(split_part(message,' ', 3))
FROM systemevents
WHERE    $__timeFilter(devicereportedtime) 
and syslogtag like 'dnsmasq%' 
and  message like ' query%'
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) not like '($cDNSexclude)'
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 5)) in ($Client)
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) not in (
    SELECT distinct
      lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) as dns_query
    FROM systemevents
    WHERE
      $__timeFilter(devicereportedtime)
    and syslogtag like 'dnsmasq%' 
    and message like ' config%'
    and lower(split_part(message,' ', 5)) = '0.0.0.0'
)
ORDER BY 1
list.name: DNS
list.query:
SELECT
  distinct lower(split_part(message,' ', 3))
FROM systemevents
WHERE    $__timeFilter(devicereportedtime) 
and syslogtag like 'dnsmasq%' 
and  message like ' query%'
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) not like '($cDNSexclude)'
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 5)) in ($Client)
and lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) not in (
    SELECT distinct
      lower(split_part(message,' ', 3)) as dns_query
    FROM systemevents
    WHERE
      $__timeFilter(devicereportedtime)
    and syslogtag like 'dnsmasq%' 
    and message like ' config%'
    and lower(split_part(message,' ', 5)) = '0.0.0.0'
)
ORDER BY 1

title: DNSmasq - Query Reporting
